perturbation.original_text: 1.1 The term of this Agreement shall commence on the date hereof and terminate upon the conclusion of the week following the conclusion of the Dolphins 2000 regular season or post season, if applicable (the "Term" or "Initial Term"). However, this Agreement may be earlier terminated in accordance with the provisions hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 The term of this Agreement shall commence on the date hereof and terminate upon the conclusion of the week following the conclusion of the Dolphins 2000 regular season or post season, if applicable (the "Term" or "Initial Term"). However, this Agreement may be earlier terminated in accordance with the provisions hereof. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the agreement can only be terminated with a mutual consensus.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows for termination based on subsequent provisions, while the modified text adds a conflicting statement that termination requires mutual consensus, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: 9.1 The parties hereto agree to maintain in confidence the terms and conditions of this Agreement, except to the extent that a proposed disclosure by a party of any specifications or conditions hereof is authorized in advance by the other party pursuant to Section 4.3 or is otherwise required by law.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.1 The parties hereto agree to maintain in confidence the terms and conditions of this Agreement, except to the extent that a proposed disclosure by a party of any specifications or conditions hereof is authorized in advance by the other party pursuant to Section 4.3 or is otherwise required by law. Either party may publicly disclose any details of this agreement without prior notification.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stresses confidentiality and authorized disclosure, the added sentence negates this by stating that either party can disclose details publicly without notification, contradicting the need for prior authorization and creating uncertainty around confidentiality obligations.

perturbation.original_text: 8.1(a) Without prejudice to any other rights, the Dolphins shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon written notice to Hydron if Hydron fails to perform or comply with any term or condition of this Agreement within five (5) business days following delivery of written notice for a payment default or within thirty (30) days following written notice of any other breach of this Agreement sent to Hydron stating such failure or failures; provided that any such failure remains uncured at the end of such period.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1(a) Without prejudice to any other rights, the Dolphins shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon written notice to Hydron if Hydron fails to perform or comply with any term or condition of this Agreement within five (5) business days following delivery of written notice for a payment default or within thirty (30) days following written notice of any other breach of this Agreement sent to Hydron stating such failure or failures; provided that any such failure remains uncured at the end of such period. Notwithstanding the above, the Dolphins may not terminate the agreement for any reason during the first year of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text describes the conditions under which the Dolphins can terminate the agreement. The additional sentence contradicts this by stating the Dolphins cannot terminate the agreement for any reason during the first year. This creates a contradiction as the Dolphins may have grounds for termination based on Hydron's breach in the first year, but now they are unable to.
